thread.title: Best Buy Announces Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Best Buy Announces Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
MINNEAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of Best Buy Co., Inc. (NYSE:BBY) has authorized the payment of a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.45 per common share. The quarterly dividend is payable on July 5, 2018, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 14, 2018. The company had 280,778,399 shares of common stock issued and outstanding as of May 5, 2018.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180525005043/en/
